text.text: Hey there ðŸ‘‹ I'm Chatbot. I'm here to help you create tickets on Jira through Slack.

*Use the `Questionnaire` shortcut*. Type `/questionnaire` and press enter, followed by a Short *Questionnaire* prompt. When submitted I'll ask for some basic detail (if applicable). Try it out by using the `/questionnaire` command in this channel.
